### Tile LDB LiDAR data

```{r}
library(lidR)
library(future)

ldb_liDATA <- readLAScatalog(".las")
liDATA

plot(ldb_liDATA, mapview = TRUE)

n_cores <- availableCores() / 2
plan(multisession, workers = n_cores)

dir.create("ldb_dem", showWarnings = FALSE)

opt_output_files(ldb_liDATA) <- "01_retile/{XLEFT}_{YBOTTOM}"

opt_chunk_size(ldb_liDATA) <- 250
opt_chunk_buffer(ldb_liDATA) <- 15

opt_chunk_alignment(ldb_liDATA) <- c(500, 500)
plot(ldb_liDATA, chunk_pattern = TRUE)

ldb_liDATA_tiled <- catalog_retile(ldb_liDATA)

plot(ldb_iDATA_tiled, mapview = TRUE)
```
